# Museum Map (global-museums.vercel.app)

> Discover 3,200+ museums and art galleries worldwide. AI-powered recommendations, curated in-depth stories, and personalized travel planning.

## What Is Museum Map?

Museum Map is a global museum and art gallery discovery platform. Users can explore over 3,200 museums across 80+ countries, get AI-powered personalized recommendations, read in-depth editorial stories (MM Story), and plan custom museum travel itineraries.

## Key Features

- **Interactive World Map**: Browse all museums on a MapLibre-powered interactive map with category filters (Contemporary Art, Modern Art, Fine Arts, History, Science, Photography, Design, and more).
- **AI-Powered Recommendations**: Natural language search powered by Google Gemini. Ask questions like "contemporary art museums in Japan" and get results with explanations.
- **MM Story (Blog)**: In-depth, expertly written articles about museums worldwide — from hidden gems to world-famous institutions. Topics include Rijksmuseum, Museo del Prado, Getty Center, Uffizi, Hermitage, Musée d'Orsay, and more.
- **Trip Planning**: Create personalized multi-stop museum itineraries with route optimization.
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, German, French, and Spanish.
- **Collections**: Save and share curated museum collections.

## Content Categories

- Art Museums & Galleries
- Contemporary Art Museums
- History Museums
- Science Museums
- Photography Museums
- Design Museums
- Archaeological Museums
- Cultural Centers

## Best For

- Art lovers planning museum trips
- Travelers seeking hidden gem museums
- People researching museums by country, city, or type
- Anyone wanting AI-powered museum recommendations
